verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: Over a typically ultra - emphatic North Korean narration and score] , [ARG0: the country 's main state propaganda broadcaster] [V: showed] [ARG1: scenes from Trump and Kim Jong Un 's meeting in Singapore , which generally showed Trump in a decent light] .

Over a typically ultra - emphatic North Korean narration and score , the country 's main state propaganda broadcaster showed [ARG0: scenes from Trump and Kim Jong Un 's meeting in Singapore] , [R-ARG0: which] [ARGM-ADV: generally] [V: showed] [ARG1: Trump in a decent light] .
